Name: Velvet Classic Quilted Toilet Tissue 24 Rolls - Luxuriously Soft, Strong and Absorbent Toilet Roll - Jumbo Bulk Pack 24 Rolls - 3-ply - White
Reviews: Especially in these days of the cost-of-living crisis, these loo rolls are a reasonable grade and are absorbent without being either too thick or too thin - good quality and great value for money. I would buy them again.
